page.title: 18WELFARE CLUB, N.WHITTINGTON.
page.content: New Whittington Welfare Club & Institute, Stone Lane. Founded 1919 by men returning World War 1. Membership 1168, 18 yrs plus, backgrounds vary. Premises owned; mortgages out-standing to breweries for improvements. Concert room, games room, lounge, bowling green, club house.Two snooker tables, electric organ, sundry games equipment. Activities: Pool, Snooker, Bowls Leagues, Ladies and Gents Darts and Dominoes Teams. Charitable acts usually for Club & Institute Union. Typical week: Sun.- Artist, Drummer, Organist, Bingo; Mon.- Bingo, Domino Drive; Tues.- Games Evening; Wed.- Snooker Match;Thur.- Pool Match; Fri.- Bingo; Sat.- Bingo, Drums and Organ, Dance or Singalong. "Membership on decline. Youngsters not supporting like older generation. Inflation affects takings."
